B.ID, B.ZDBMID, B.ZDRID, B.ZDSJ, B.ZT, B.DYZT, B.DPRTCODE, B.ZDJSRID, B.ZDJSRQ, B.ZDJSYY, B.SHBMID, B.SHYJ, B.SHRID, B.SHSJ, B.PFBMID, B.PFYJ, B.PFRID, B.PFSJ, B.JX, B.GGDBH, B.XGQ_BB, B.XGH_BB, B.XMH, B.SSBF, B.SSZJ, B.ZY, B.XGYJ, B.XGBJ, B.XDNR, B.XGYY, B.XDQX, B.MELQDFJID,B.SHJL,B.PFJL, U.ID as ZID,U.USERNAME as ZUSERNAME,U.REALNAME as ZREALNAME
mapper.update:
update B_G_019 set ZT = 3, SHRID = #{shrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHBMID = #{shbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHYJ = #{shyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHSJ = sysdate, SHJL = 3 where ID in
#{id}

update B_G_019 set ZT = 4, PFRID = #{pfrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFBMID = #{pfbmid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFYJ = #{pfyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PFSJ = sysdate, pfJL = 4 where ID in
#{id}
mapper.select:
select
, A.ID AS AID , A.MAINID AS AMAINID , A.DPRTCODE AS ADPRTCODE , A.YSWJM AS AYSWJM , A.WBWJM AS AWBWJM , A.NBWJM AS ANBWJM , A.WJDX AS AWJDX , A.CFLJ AS ACFLJ ,( CASE WHEN A.HZM is not null THEN '.' WHEN A.HZM is null THEN '' END )|| A.HZM AS HZM , BG.ID AS MBID , BG.MAINID AS MBMAINID , BG.YJLX AS MBYJLX , BG.YJNR AS MBYJNR ,S.ID as SID,S.USERNAME as SUSERNAME,S.REALNAME as SREALNAME ,P.ID as PID,P.USERNAME as PUSERNAME,P.REALNAME as PREALNAME ,JS.ID as JSID,JS.USERNAME as JSUSERNAME,JS.REALNAME as JSREALNAME from B_G_019 B LEFT JOIN T_USER U ON B.ZDRID = U.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER S ON B.SHRID = S.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER P ON B.PFRID = P.ID LEFT JOIN T_USER JS ON B.ZDJSRID = JS.ID LEFT JOIN D_011 A ON B.MELQDFJID = A.MAINID and A.YXZT = 1 LEFT JOIN B_G_01901 BG ON B.ID = BG.MAINID where B.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
